Blog.post: k..this is my second time writing..hmm..lets tok bout yesterdae..not bad reali..wake up at 10.25 and watch pokemon..my favourite show..hehe..and then go out wit syaziah for a walk at pasir ris beach..then she wanna go escape theme park..wat to do..i hv to follow her..dia tak bawa duit abis tu suruh aku blanja..kurang hansem..hehe..juz jk syaziah..k..lets continue..after tt i hv to go to my religious klas..i have forgotten tat i hv a test on tat dae..ah wat the fcuk..study last minute..dunno whether can pass a not..hope can uh..then dis hafiz,fauzah bro,make so much comments during the test..still can have private tuition lak tu..pala buto..aku ada buat asl leh hentam for my arab test..bet i gonna fail on tt one..then reach home,syaziah kol me if i wanna go to the movies wit her..apa lago..pergi ah..free tiket seh..watch the movie alien vs predator..cool..haha..then go out for dinner at svenson's..go back home around 10 pm..my mom nag,nag,nag at me..i ignore her..stay up till 12 midnight to watch manchester match..not bad reali the match..waste a lot of chances..haha..nvm..once all the players come back from injuries,suspensions and from the olimpics.manchester united will go all the way to win back the title..ok lar..i wanna go and eat..bye!

ok..so this is my first time writing on my blog..hmm..wat to sae eh?..k..yesterdae..woke up at six to get to skool early cos haven't do hw..so arrive in skool around 6.45 and do my maths..thank god i manage to finish it..haha..so from there on..lesson and lesson and more lesson till 12.30..i try to escape from chem klas at 12.25 but kena caught by tt fuckig mr seet..nag,nag,nag,nag,blah,blah at me..but u noe me..i did not even listen to wat he was saying..i was looking at firdaus playing water with edwind..haha..behaviour like a pri 1 student..so ater tt go to the mosque for fridae prayers..den when reach skool after fridae prayers,it rain..oh man..i was hoping to watch the match between eastwich vs prcs..but it rain..argh!..and then my adik angkat,syaz,wanna go back wit me and my buddies..but the prob is syuk is following her everywhere she go..juz like a dog following its master..jaf and i invent a nickname for him..scooby doo 2..nazmi is the real scooby doo..haha..juz jk naz..and then syaz ask me to help her to get rid of syuk..den i ask her to follow me to go up to my klas where we saw syahmi and farhan..ruz and farhan entertain us by doing some breakdance moves..awesome..den we tot tat syuk had went home..but NO..he was in the canteen wit his frends..he actualli wanna go back wit syaz..but u noe wat..my adeq dun wanna go back wit him..haha..sucker..so came up wit a plan but it failed..syuk saw syaz going hm with me and my buddies..so all the way to the bus stop i became silent..u noe why syaz..keep it a secret..then marie and jaf ask me wats bothering me..i kept quiet..and sooner later syaz became quiet as well..haha..like brother like sister..then jaf was like so call confused..ask syaz wats wrong and she kept quiet..hehe..kecian jaf..den at nite..i tertido kat blakang klas at my madrasah..so fucking tired and sleepy..my uztaz nag,nag,nag..reach hm at 11 pm..so bored and decided to sms syaz..well tts all lar..till next time..bye..
